REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0592 reute h f BC-<DTD-ENTERPRISES-INC> 03-06 0073

TEXT.TITLE: <DTD ENTERPRISES INC> IN REORGANIZATION
TEXT.BODY: DTD Enterprises Inc said it filed an 8-K report indicating that <EaglesLair Development Corp> had assumed control of the company under a reorganization plan signed last month. The company said D. Gerald Lach, president of EaglesLair, was named president and a director of DTD. In addition, DTS's board resigned and EaglesLair appointed new directors, the company said. Reuter
